name: H-RUN
description:
A sequel to the award winning game G-RUN, with updated graphics, better mechanics and structure!

This was a side-project to a fangame I've been recently working on.

I've figured out Death Events, Surfaces, Shadows and life itself whilst working on this.

The sort-of storyline is that you are a robot of some sort destroying wine glasses which have candles stuck on to them monsters that have been spotted there nearby. Little do you know, that they have their secret weapon aswell.

THIS GAME FEATURES:

  • ROBOTS
  • MONSTERS
  • BLOOD
  • WALLS
  • DESTRUCTIBLE WALLS
  • BULLETS!!!!
  • MORE BULLETS!!!
  • EVIL ROBOTS!!!
  • HIGH SCORES!!
  • AND THE MEANING OF LIFE.

Mouse 1 to Fire Normally
Mouse 2 to do a Galactical Fire
